omicronAPI
Interface OmicronTouchListener

public interface OmicronTouchListener

Interface used to set event call-back functions. To receive events, implement this class and pass to OmicronAPI via setTouchListener().

Method Summary
 void touchDown(int ID, float xPos, float yPos, float xWidth, float yWidth)
          Called on a touch down event.
 void touchMove(int ID, float xPos, float yPos, float xWidth, float yWidth)
          Called on a touch move event.
 void touchUp(int ID, float xPos, float yPos, float xWidth, float yWidth)
          Called on a touch up event.
 

Method Detail

touchDown

void touchDown(int ID,
               float xPos,
               float yPos,
               float xWidth,
               float yWidth)
Called on a touch down event.

Parameters:
ID - touch id
xPos - screen x position
yPos - screen y position
xWidth - screen touch width
yWidth - screen touch height
